trans-unit.source: When you delete a language, all related translations in the database will be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
trans-unit.target: Ketika Anda menghapus bahasa, SEMUA HASIL TERJEMAHAN DI DATABASE AKAN DIHAPUS, apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus bahasa ini?

trans-unit.source: When you delete a language, all related translations in the database will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Ketika anda menghapus bahasa, semua yang berhubungan dengan terjemahan akan terhapus dari database.

trans-unit.source: Your .htaccess file must be writable.
You cannot delete the default language.
trans-unit.target: Anda tdk dapat menghapus bahasa default

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete the language currently in use. Please select a different language.
trans-unit.target: Anda tidak dapat menghapus bahasa yang sedang digunakan. Silahkan mengubah bahasa sebelum menghapus.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the status of the default language.
trans-unit.target: Anda tidak dapat mengubah status bahasa default.

trans-unit.source: This ISO code is already linked to another language.
trans-unit.target: Kode ISO ini telah digunakan oleh bahasa yang lain.

trans-unit.source: Flag and "No picture" image fields are required.
trans-unit.target: Flag and \"No picture\" image fields are required.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while copying "No Picture" image to your product folder.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while copying \"No Picture\" image to your product folder.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while copying "No picture" image to your category folder.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while copying \"No picture\" image to your category folder.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while copying "No picture" image to your brand folder.
trans-unit.target: Eror saat menyalin gambar "Gambar tidak tersedia" ke direktori brand.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while resizing "No picture" image to your product directory.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while resizing \"No picture\" image to your product directory.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while resizing "No picture" image to your category directory.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while resizing \"No picture\" image to your category directory.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while resizing "No picture" image to your brand directory.
trans-unit.target: Eror saat proses resize gambar "Gambar tidak ditemukan" di direktori brand.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during image deletion process.
Iso code is not valid
Technical Error: ps_version is not valid
Wrong ISO code, or the selected language pack is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Kode ISO salah, atau file bahasa tidak tersedia.

trans-unit.source: Technical Error: translation server unreachable.
trans-unit.target: Eror teknis: server penerjemah bahasa tidak dapat diakses.

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete the default currency
trans-unit.target: Mata uang default tidak dapat dihapus

trans-unit.source: You cannot disable the default currency
trans-unit.target: Anda tidak dapat menonaktifkan mata uang default

trans-unit.source: This currency already exists.
The currency conversion rate cannot be equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Kurs mata uang tidak dapat bernilai 0.

trans-unit.source: This ISO code already exists. You cannot create two states with the same ISO code.
trans-unit.target: Kode ISO sudah ada. Anda tidak dapat membuat dua propinsi dengan kode ISO sama.

trans-unit.source: This state was used in at least one address. It cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: Propinsi digunakan di alamat. Propinsi tidak dapat dihapus.

trans-unit.source: A tax rule already exists for this country/state with tax only behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aturan pajak sudah ada untuk negara/propinsi ini dengan perlakuan hanya pajak.

trans-unit.source: The Zip/postal code is invalid. It must be typed as follows: %format% for %country%.
trans-unit.target: Kode pos tidak valid. Harus dalam format sebagai berikut: %format% untuk %country%.

trans-unit.source: An error has occurred: Cannot save the current tax rule.
trans-unit.target: An error has occurred: Can't save the current tax rule

trans-unit.source: Cannot create the folder "%folder%". Please check your directory writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Gagal membuat folder "%folder%". Harap cek jika folder tersebut dapat ditulisi.

trans-unit.source: You must select two languages in order to copy data from one to another.
trans-unit.target: Anda harus memiliki dua bahasa untuk menyalin satu bahasa ke bahasa lainnya.

trans-unit.source: You must select two themes in order to copy data from one to another.
trans-unit.target: Anda harus memiliki dua theme untuk menyalin satu theme ke theme lainnya.

trans-unit.source: There is nothing to copy (same language and theme).
trans-unit.target: Tidak ada yang dapat disalin (bahasa dan theme sama).

trans-unit.source: Theme(s) not found
Impossible to copy "%source%" to "%dest%".
Impossible to translate "%dest%".
A part of the data has been copied but some of the language files could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Data berhasil disalin tapi beberapa file data tidak ditemukan.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while copying data.
Impossible to create the directory "%folder%".
An error occurred while creating archive.
Please select a language and a theme.
Tab "%s" is not valid
Validation failed for: %file%
Unidentified file found: %file%
trans-unit.target: Ditemukan file yang tidak dapat diidentifikasi: %file%

trans-unit.source: The archive cannot be extracted.
ISO CODE invalid "%iso_code%" for the following file: "%file%"
trans-unit.target: Kode ISO tidak valid "%iso_code%" pada file berikut: "%file%"

trans-unit.source: Cannot write to the theme's language file (%s). Please check writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Gagal menulis ke file bahasa theme (%s). Harap cek hak tulis ke file tersebut.

trans-unit.source: Invalid theme "%theme%"
Invalid iso code "%iso_code%"
This %type_content% file extension is not accepted.
Invalid module name "%module%"
Invalid mail name "%mail%"
Directory "%folder%" cannot be created
Your email translations contain some invalid HTML and cannot be saved. Please check your content.
trans-unit.target: Terjemahan pada email Anda berisi kode HTML yang tidak valid sehingga tidak dapat simpan. Harap cek kembali.

trans-unit.source: Your HTML email templates cannot contain JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: Template HTML email tidak boleh mengandung kode JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: Empty string found, please edit: "%file%"
There is an error in template, an empty string has been found. Please edit: "%file%"
trans-unit.target: Eror pada template, string kosong ditemukan. Harap edit: "%file%"

trans-unit.source: The module directory must be writable.
A mail directory exists for the "%iso_code%" language, but not for the default language (%language%) in %folder%
trans-unit.target: Direktori mail ditemukan untuk kode bahasa "%iso_code%", tetapi bukan untuk bahasa default (%language%) di %folder%

trans-unit.source: missing translation(s)
No Subject was found for %mail_name% in the database.
trans-unit.target: Subjek untuk %mail_name% tidak ditemukan dalam database.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem getting the mail files.
English language files must exist in %folder% folder
trans-unit.target: Harap pastikan bahwa file bahasa Inggris ada di folder %folder%

trans-unit.source: Cannot write language file for email subjects. Path is: %folder%
trans-unit.target: Tidak dapat menulis file bahasa untuk subjek email. Lokasi di: %folder%

trans-unit.source: Cannot write into the "%file%"
This expression uses a special syntax:
This ISO code already exists.You cannot create two countries with the same ISO code.
trans-unit.target: Kode ISO sudah ada. Anda tidak dapat membuat dua propinsi dengan kode ISO yang sama.

trans-unit.source: Invalid address layout %s
This tax is currently in use as a tax rule. Are you sure you'd like to continue?
trans-unit.target: Pajak ini sedang digunakan dalam aturan pajak. Apakah Anda yakin untuk melanjutkan?

trans-unit.source: This tax is currently in use as a tax rule. If you continue, this tax will be removed from the tax rule. Are you sure you'd like to continue?
trans-unit.target: Pajak ini sedang digunakan dalam aturan pajak. Jika Anda terus pajak ini akan dihapus dari aturan pajak, apakah Anda yakin?

trans-unit.source: Cannot load the localization pack.
Please select at least one item to import.
Fatal error: ISO code is not correct
Fatal error: IETF code %s is not correct
Sorry this language is not available
Server does not have permissions for writing.
trans-unit.target: Server tidak memiliki izin untuk menulis.
trans-unit.note: Context: File: classes/Language.php:1092 Comment: @todo Throw exception

trans-unit.source: Language pack unavailable.
trans-unit.note: Context: File: classes/Language.php:1122 Comment: @todo Throw exception

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while creating the language: %s
Translation successfully updated
Failed to update translation
The geolocation database is unavailable.
Country selection is invalid.
Invalid whitelist
The translations have been successfully added.
The translation was successfully copied.
Localization pack imported successfully.
The translation was added successfully, but the language has not been created.
trans-unit.target: Terjemahan berhasil ditambahkan tetapi bahasa belum dibuat

trans-unit.source: Cannot add configuration %1$s for %2$s language
trans-unit.target: Tidak dapat menambahkan konfigurasi %1$s untuk bahasa %2$s

trans-unit.source: Importing a new language may fail without the OpenSSL module. Please enable "openssl.so" on your server configuration.
trans-unit.target: Impor bahasa baru bisa gagal jika modul OpenSSL tidak terinstall. Harap aktifkan "openssl.so" di konfigurasi server Anda.

trans-unit.source: Cannot load country: %d
Cannot enable the associated country: %s
Invalid Zone name.
Invalid state properties.
Cannot update the associated country: %s
An error occurred while adding the state.
An error occurred while fetching the state.
Invalid tax properties.
An error occurred while importing the tax: %s
This tax rule cannot be saved.
Invalid currency properties.
An error occurred while importing the currency: %s
trans-unit.target: Terjadi eror selagi mengimpor mata uang: %s

trans-unit.source: Localization pack corrupted: wrong unit type.
trans-unit.target: File lokalisasi rusak: tipe unit salah.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while setting the units.
An error occurred while installing the module: %s
An error occurred while uninstalling the module: %s
An error has occurred, this module does not exist: %s
trans-unit.target: Terjadi eror, modul ini tidak ditemukan: %s

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the configuration setup: %1$s
An error occurred during the default group update
An error has occurred during the default group update
Invalid language ISO code (%s)
Incorrect Tax Manager class [%s]
Tax Manager class not found [%s]
No tax
Language files must be complete to allow copying of translations.
trans-unit.target: Bahasa file (seperti yang ditunjukkan di Tools>> Bahasa>> Edition) harus lengkap untuk memungkinkan menyalin terjemahan

trans-unit.source: Before changing the default currency, we strongly recommend that you enable maintenance mode. Indeed, any change on the default currency requires a manual adjustment of the price of each product and its combinations.
trans-unit.target: Sebelum mengganti mata uang bawaan, kami sangat menganjurkan supaya Anda mengaktifkan mode pemeliharaan. Sebenarnya, setiap perubahan pada mata uang bawaan membutuhkan penyesuaian manual harga tiap produk dan kombinasinya.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to restore the default address format for this country?
trans-unit.target: Apakah Anda yakin untuk menerapkan pilihan ini?

trans-unit.source: A language pack is available for this ISO.
trans-unit.target: File bahasa tersedia untuk kode ISO berikut ini.

trans-unit.source: The Prestashop version compatible with this language and your system is:
trans-unit.target: Versi PrestaShop kompatibel dengan bahasa dan sistem anda ini adalah:

trans-unit.source: After creating the language, you can import the content of the language pack, which you can download under "International -- Translations."
trans-unit.target: Setelah membuat bahasa, Anda dapat mengimpor isi dari paket bahasa yang dapat Anda unduh dari menu "Internasional -- Terjemahan."

trans-unit.source: No language pack is available on prestashop.com for this ISO code
trans-unit.target: Tidak ada file bahasa yang tersedia di prestashop.com untuk kode ISO ini

trans-unit.source: This language pack is NOT complete and cannot be used in the front or back office because some files are missing.
trans-unit.target: Bahasa ini TIDAK lengkap dan tidak dapat digunakan di front office ataupun back office karena beberapa file hilang.

trans-unit.source: Apache mod_security is activated on your server. This could result in some Bad Request errors
trans-unit.target: Apache mod_security aktif di server Anda. Jika aktif dapat menyebabkan eror Bad Request

trans-unit.source: Warning! Your hosting provider is using the Suhosin patch for PHP, which limits the maximum number of fields allowed in a form:
trans-unit.target: Peringatan, penyedia hosting Anda menggunakan patch suhosin untuk PHP, yang membatasi jumlah maksimum bidang untuk posting di form:

trans-unit.source: %limit% for suhosin.post.max_vars.
%limit% for suhosin.request.max_vars.
Please ask your hosting provider to increase the Suhosin limit to
trans-unit.target: Silahkan meminta tempat hosting Anda untuk menaikan batas Suhosin ke

trans-unit.source: Warning! Your PHP configuration limits the maximum number of fields allowed in a form:
trans-unit.target: Perhatian ! Konfigurasi PHP Anda membatasi jumlah field yang diperbolehkan dalam satu form

trans-unit.source: for max_input_vars.
Please ask your hosting provider to increase this limit to
trans-unit.target: Silahkan meminta tempat hosting Anda untuk menaikan batasnya ke

trans-unit.source: %s at least, or you will have to edit the translation files.
trans-unit.target: sedikitnya %s, atau Anda harus edit file terjemahan.

trans-unit.source: %s at least, or you will have to edit the translation files manually.
trans-unit.target: sedikitnya %s, atau Anda harus merubah file translasi secara manual.

trans-unit.source: Please install the %module_name% module before using this feature.
trans-unit.target: Instal modul %module_name% sebelum fitur ini digunakan.
